CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Manage learning providers in Viva Learning admin tab
CurrentVersion.description: ,Learning admins can manage the configured learning providers in Viva Learning admin tab. This feature will provide a detailed sync status as well as sync logs in case of a failed sync.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manage learning providers in Viva Learning Admin tab
OldVersion.description: ,Learning admins can manage the configured learning providers in Viva Learning admin tab. This feature will provide a detailed sync status as well as sync logs in case of a failed sync.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
OldVersion.description: ,The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Add learning to calendar on Viva Learning mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Add to Calendar mobile feature will help learners on the Viva Learning mobile app add learning content to their calendars and block focused time for learning.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Add learning to calendar on Viva Learning mobile app
OldVersion.description: Add to Calendar mobile feature will help learners on the Viva Learning mobile app add learning content to their calendars and block focused time for learning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Search relevance improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Improvements to relevancy of search results in Viva Learning including attribute boosting, spell correction, exact match, and personalized results based on interests.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search relevance improvements in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description: Improvements to relevancy of search results in Viva Learning including attribute boosting, spell correction, exact match, and personalized results based on interests.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Additional filters for search results
CurrentVersion.description: Viva learning will be supporting more Filters on Language, Content Type and Source fields in Search results page.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Additional filters for search results in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description:
Viva learning will be supporting more Filters on
Language, Content Type and Source fields in Search results page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is over for up to 7 days. Note: We have updated the release phase and month to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
OldVersion.description: To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is over for up to 7 days. Note: We have updated the release phase and month to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Bring your own content to learning collections with external URL support
CurrentVersion.description: Users can add content using external links from sources like YouTube, Vimeo, news articles, etc while creating learning collections.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Bring your own content using external URLs from sources like YouTube, Vimeo, news articles, etc while creating learning collections
OldVersion.description: Users can add content using external links from sources like YouTube, Vimeo, news articles, etc while creating learning collections.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
OldVersion.description:
,
Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed. Note: We have updated the release phase to reflect the current state as we are evaluating this release and have paused the rollout. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Follow a meeting in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Follow is a new meeting response (RSVP) option that goes beyond the traditional Accept, Tentative and Decline choices geared towards individuals with high meeting loads and conflicting meetings each day. Follow is the ideal RSVP option for meetings you can't attend but still want to stay engaged and receive info about. Other attendees will be able to see if you are following a meeting. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Follow a meeting in new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description:
Follow is a new meeting response (RSVP) option
that goes beyond the traditional Accept, Tentative and Decline choices geared
towards individuals with high meeting loads and conflicting meetings each day.
Follow is the ideal RSVP option for meetings you can't attend but still want to
stay engaged and receive info about. Other attendees will be able to see if you
are following a meeting. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for
Windows and Outlook on the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
CurrentVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Sort Search results by Ratings in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Increased synergy between webapp and Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to easily switch within Viva Learning Teams app and Webapp.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Increased synergy of Viva Learning Webapp and Teams App
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to easily switch within Viva Learning Teams app and Webapp.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Microsoft Shell integration in Viva Learning webapp
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an Application Header similar to other Microsoft M365 webapps. It will help users to easily switch between Microsoft webapps.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft Shell Integration in Viva Learning Webapp
OldVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an Application Header similar to other Microsoft M365 webapps. It will help users to easily switch between Microsoft webapps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Proficiency level content filter
CurrentVersion.description: Users can filter content based on the proficiency level of the content—Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Level Filter in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description: Users can filter content based on the proficiency level of the content—Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

OldVersion.title: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
OldVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
OldVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Recommended actions for finetuning policies
CurrentVersion.description:
,We are introducing additional recommended actions to provide guidance on fine-tuning your insider risk policies and implementing advanced configurations.
These new tasks and journeys will be accessible through the Recommended Actions page. 
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Recommended actions for finetuning policies
OldVersion.description:
,We are introducing additional recommended actions to provide guidance on fine-tuning your insider risk policies and implementing advanced configurations.
These new tasks and journeys will be accessible through the Recommended Actions page. 
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Popups enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are expanding the functionality of oversharing popups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support the following: 1) Additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled, Message/Attachment is not labeled, and File extension is, and 2) Customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Popups enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
OldVersion.description: ,We are expanding the functionality of oversharing popups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support the following: 1) Additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled, Message/Attachment is not labeled, and File extension is, and 2) Customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Simulation mode for DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this capability, Admins will be able to try a Microsoft Purview DLP policy, assess its impact, and fine tune the policy as required in an isolated environment. This will help Admins build confidence in the configuration of the policy and reduce the policy enforcement time.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: EML, MSG, and OFT File Support
CurrentVersion.description: EML, MSG, and OFT files type support will enable users to open "*,eml", "*.oft", and "*.msg" files in the new Outlook by dragging-and-dropping them onto the reading pane, or by double-clicking on them, or by using the Open With menu option in File Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement shown to attendees joining the appointment to address specific considerations and concerns for their online engagement. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Configure learning academies
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create and manage learning academies in the Viva Learning Admin tab.
